cc.alcina.framework.gwt.client.widget.richtext
Class RichTextToolbar.EventListener

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.ChangeListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.ClickListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.KeyboardListener, java.util.EventListener
Enclosing class:
RichTextToolbar
protected class RichTextToolbar.EventListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.ClickListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.ChangeListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.KeyboardListener

We use an inner EventListener class to avoid exposing event methods on the RichTextToolbar itself.
